properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It is finished Yes indeed Finished ev'ry jot Sinner this is all you need Tell me is it not{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nothing either great or small Nothing sinner no Jesus did it did it all Long long ago{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When He from His lofty throne Stooped to do and die Ev'ry thing was fully done Listen to His cry{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Weary working burdened one Why do you toil so Cease your doing all was done Long long ago{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Till to Jesus' work you cling By a simple faith Doing is a deadly thing Doing ends in death Cast your deadly doing down Down at Jesus' feet Stand in Him in Him alone Gloriously complete{/lang-eng}
